examples.example: 小时候的我总是对世界充满了好奇和幻想。

translate.english: When I was a child, I was always full of curiosity and fantasy about the world.

examples.example: 小时候的梦想一直激励着我不断努力前行。

translate.english: The childhood dream has always inspired me to keep striving forward.

examples.example: 小时候的我拥有很多天真无邪的快乐时光。

translate.english: When I was a child, I had a lot of innocent and carefree happy times.
